europeana:record.dc:title: A new Polyrhachis (Myrma) vestita-group species from Sulawesi (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Formicinae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Kohout R.J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera
Formicidae
Polyrhachis (Myrma), vestita-group
new species
new records
Sulawesi
europeana:record.dc:description: Polyrhachis vanachterbergi, a new species in the recently established Polyrhachis vestita-group, of the subgenus Myrma, is described and illustrated. An updated identification key to the species of this endemic Sulawesian group is provided. A number of new distribution records of other Polyrhachis species from the South East, South West and Central Sulawesi are included.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: A new Polyrhachis (Myrma) vestita-group species from Sulawesi (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Formicinae) (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 82) (Issue 30)
